mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_post_location (mb_uid, subject, locationName, locationAddr, content) VALUES (#{mb_uid}, #{subject}, #{locationName}, #{locationAddr}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_post_location SET subject = #{subject}, locationName = #{locationName}, locationAddr = #{locationAddr}, content = #{content} WHERE uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT tpl.uid uid, mb_uid, username, subject, content, viewCnt, tpl.regDate regDate FROM (t_post_location tpl JOIN t_member tm ON tpl.mb_uid = tm.uid) ORDER BY tpl.uid DESC LIMIT #{param1}, 10
SELECT tpl.uid uid, mb_uid, username, subject, content, viewCnt, tpl.regDate regDate FROM (t_post_location tpl JOIN t_member tm ON tpl.mb_uid = tm.uid) ORDER BY tpl.viewCnt DESC LIMIT 3
